name: OR_LNLG_OTHEQP_DFCT_RPTD
description: This table contains documentation regarding the reporting of hysteroscopy pump fluid deficits.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: FLUID_DEFICIT_REPORTED_C_NAME
columns.description: This item is used to document if (and to whom) a fluid deficit for the hysteroscopy pump was reported.
